column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The pizza comes in four sizes: personal (for 1 person)
column4: and large (for 4). The small size was more than big enough for the two of us. This was our first time having Chicago deep dish pizza
column5: so we ended up being pleasantly surprised. With the pizza being deep
column6: I had always assumed it would be mostly crust. It ended up being mostly cheese and sauce
column7: which made the pizza extremely juicy and moist!
